properties.title: User's Manual: Building an Advanced Web Test Plan

section.name: 6. Building an Advanced Web Test Plan
section.p: In this section, you will learn how to create advanced Test Plans to test a Web site.

li.a: 6.3 Handling User Sessions With URL Rewriting

section.p: For an example of a basic Test Plan, see Building a Web Test Plan.

section.name: 6.3 Handling User Sessions With URL Rewriting
